A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A swing and a miss. TFA set up a few possible storylines for this film and TLJ basically said\, \"no thanks.\"  When I saw the \"Star Wars\" logo during the opening credits\, I had a huge smile on my face and was on the edge of my seat.  By the end credits\, I was slumped in my chair with a puzzled look on my face wondering \"what did I just watch?\"  Luke Skywalker throwing the lightsaber over his shoulder as if to say \"who cares\" sums up this entire film.
